name: Ascended Governor

screen_description:

+20 FoodRenown level 2

name: Fortifying Governor

level_data.effect_description: Defensive City Structures cost -20% less <gold></gold> <hyperlink>Gold</hyperlink> and -20% less <structureprod></structureprod> <hyperlink>Production</hyperlink> to build
The Governed city suffers no penalties from being besieged or having pillaged provinces
